Patriotic Red White and Blue 4th of July BEE BBQ Invitation

Hot Deals! Patriotic Red White and Blue 4th of July BEE BBQ Invitation – 4th Of July Invitations This item is trending! Patriotic Red White and Blue 4th of July BEE BBQ Invitation if you are looking for it, we recommend it Patriotic Red White and Blue 4th of July BEE BBQ Invitation You can order itInvite your friends and family to ‘join the buzz’ and ‘fly on over’ with a fun bee-themed 4th July Celebration BBQ party invitation. With Red and blue text on a white background and an image of a patriotic red white and blue Bee, this has a very patriotic feel. The perfect way to celebrate America’s birthday with Buzz, BBQ and Red, White and Blue! You can customize all the text with your event details and put a message for guests at the bottom of the invitation – such as a request to bring a dish, or to give some information about the event. If it’s not required, just space-fill / delete that line. The back of the invitation is white with a repeating pattern of the Bee image that appears on the front of the invitation. Price:$1.98

Hot Deals! Patriotic Red White and Blue 4th of July BEE BBQ Invitation ($1.98)

Category : 4th Of July Invitations
